Author: cloakofdirt
Text: I have some of that 'diet salt' which is half potassium, just mixed up some with water in a glass and drank it... can potassium really cause bloating like this? I felt like my whole abdomen filled with water within half an hour o_o scary stuff.

Author: lightsflicker
Text: this is probably dehydration. you'll be ok, drink some water. take some potassium if you have some
